alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued February 25 at 8:46PM PST until February 26 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures between 32 and 35 degrees will likely result in frost formation. * WHERE...The Central Coast, Santa Barbara south coast, Ventura county valleys, Santa CLarita Valley, and interior portions of the Ventura coast. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
